about.name: Olexandr Oliiynychenko
description: Mathematician by education. Worked at the Institute of Mathematics of the National Academy of Sciences until 2003. Over the next 10 years, progressed from sales manager to head of a distribution company (FMCG).
In 2013, shifted to internet marketing, promoting various educational projects. Since 2016, focused on what truly inspires me — web development and UX design.
Banking application development for internal operations.
SCSS/Pug templates + Angular 8 + PrimeNG components.
Created custom UI elements and maintained extandable architecture.
Worked closely with QA and backend teams to ensure smooth integration.
Application architecture and front-end logic for PWA.
Layout + Angular + Node.js + MongoDB stack.
Used Material Design framework for UI.
Integrated share features via Facebook, VK, and Twitter APIs.
Taxi booking platform development for operators and customers.
Angular for admin dashboard.
Express.js + Sequelize + Postgres for backend.
Material Design and MUI frameworks for UI.
Used React in an app for placing customer orders.
React-based admin dashboard for event creation and management.
Developed internal admin panel for customer support tasks.
Mobile application development using React Native.
Maintained and optimized PostgreSQL database structure.
Set up different marketing campaigns and integrated analytics tools.
